price: Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti “Nimumbwire! Amazi yanyu (mukoresha) aramutse arigitiye ikuzimu (agakama), ni nde (utari Allah) wabagarurira amazi (y’isoko) atemba?”
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَصۡبَحَ مَآؤُكُمۡ غَوۡرٗا فَمَن يَأۡتِيكُم بِمَآءٖ مَّعِينِۭ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qul ara-aytum in aṣbaḥa māukum ghawran faman yatīkum bimāin maʿīnin
